creator: apache@cashby.me.uk
text:
Would be useful to have some kind of switch either in the ConversionPattern or 
as a separate property to disable output of stack traces for a given log 
level / category.

Especially for web applications with a large number of logging comments.

This is one of the planned features for 1.3. Consequently, I am closing this 
report. Do not hesitate to reopen it if the feature does not get implemented in 
the near future.
creator: ceki@apache.org
